page.title: 18Interesting People.
page.content: Mr. Downs has lived in Olveston for nearly 85 years(that is all his life). He has actually lived in 5 different houses during that time. His present home he has lived in for 56 years. Mr. Downs believes the village has grown too big. Some of the biggest changes he has seen is the increase of motor cars and too many new buildings. Mrs. Ashby lives in the old Infant School at Old Down. At one time young children transferred from this school, when they were old enough, to the Junior School in Olveston about 1 mile away. The building has been converted since 196O but it was originally built in 1857 and closed in 1954. Mrs. Ashby has lived there now for some 26 years.
